name: Two Bullets
description:
Two Bullets is a 1v1 game about shooting your opponent, but there are only ever 2 bullets.

Once you´ve fired your shot, you´ll have to pick it up again, but be weary, becuse so can the other player.

Coming Soon!
  • A fully working controls menu 
  • A feature that, makes the game more fair (a secret :o)
Rules!
  • If you press jump twice you will make a Double Jump.
  • You can destroy the Normal Crates with the bullets.
  • If you shoot the Explosive Crates they will explode and kill in its radius.
  • Jump on the Spring and get a much higher jump.
Controls: Player 1/Blue:
  • Right: D
  • Left: A
  • Jump: W
  • Shoot: Space
  • Sprint: Left Shift
Player 2/Red:
  • Right: RightArrow
  • Left: LeftArrow
  • Jump: UpArrow
  • Shoot: Right Shift
  • Sprint: Right Ctrl
